Metric cpu_id (cpu)
Identifier 'cpu' summary or 'cpuN' per logical CPU
Computation: n/a
Origin: literal
Notes: Summary line uses literal 'cpu'.
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric cpu_utilization (cpu)
Overall non-idle, non-iowait CPU percent for interval
Computation: 100 * (Δtotal - Δidle - Δiowait)/Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Excludes iowait.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_idle_percent (cpu)
Idle time percent
Computation: 100 * Δidle / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: First number after id/io.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_iowait_percent (cpu)
I/O wait time percent
Computation: 100 * Δiowait / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Second number after id/io.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_user_percent (cpu)
User mode time percent
Computation: 100 * Δuser / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: First number after u/s/n.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_system_percent (cpu)
Kernel mode time percent
Computation: 100 * Δsystem / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Second number after u/s/n.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_nice_percent (cpu)
User time at altered priority
Computation: 100 * Δuser_low_priority / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Third number after u/s/n.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_hardirq_percent (cpu)
Hardware interrupt handling time
Computation: 100 * Δirq / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Labelled under irq h/s.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric cpu_softirq_percent (cpu)
Software interrupt handling time
Computation: 100 * Δsoftirq / Δtotal
Origin: computed
Notes: Second number after irq h/s.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric fpc_cycles_total (fpc)
Fast path total CPU cycles observed over interval
Computation: Raw hardware or software accumulated cycles counter
Origin: fastpath module counters
Notes: Used as denominator for busy percent and other derived rates.
Units: cycles Kind: counter

Metric fpc_cycles_per_packet (fpc)
Average fast path CPU cycles consumed per processed packet over interval
Computation: Δcycles / Δpackets (guard divide by zero)
Origin: computed fastpath counters
Notes: Indicates efficiency; lower is better at constant throughput.
Units: cycles_per_packet Kind: float

Metric fpc_cycles_ic_pkt (fpc)
Internal classification cycles per packet (subset of total)
Computation: Δic_cycles / Δpackets
Origin: fastpath internal counters
Notes: Helps isolate classification overhead vs forwarding.
Units: cycles_per_packet Kind: float

Metric fpc_cpu_busy_percent (fpc)
Fast path CPU busy percent over interval
Computation: 100 * busy_cycles / total_cycles (derived by ptop fast path module)
Origin: computed
Notes: Placeholder doc generated for test coverage; refine with precise provenance in later revision.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_total_memory (mem)
Total installed physical memory
Computation: MemTotal * 1024
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Notes: Constant during run.
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric mem_free_percent (mem)
Percent free (unused)
Computation: 100 * MemFree / MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_buffers_percent (mem)
Buffer cache percent
Computation: 100 * Buffers / MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_cached_percent (mem)
File cache percent (Active(file)+Inactive(file))
Computation: 100 * (Active(file)+Inactive(file))/MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Notes: Excludes anon.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_slab_percent (mem)
Slab memory percent
Computation: 100 * Slab / MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_anon_percent (mem)
Anonymous pages percent
Computation: 100 * AnonPages / MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_sysv_shm_percent (mem)
System V shared memory percent
Computation: 100 * (sum shm segment pages *4)/ MemTotal
Origin: /proc/sysvipc/shm
Notes: Segments aggregated & converted kB -> pct.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_swap_used_percent (mem)
Swap utilization percent
Computation: 100 * (SwapTotal - SwapFree)/SwapTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Notes: If SwapTotal==0 prints 0.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_swap_total_bytes (mem)
Total swap capacity
Computation: SwapTotal * 1024
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric mem_hugepages_total (mem)
Configured HugePages_Total
Computation: Raw value
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: count Kind: int

Metric mem_hugepages_free (mem)
Free huge pages
Computation: Raw value
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Units: count Kind: int

Metric mem_available_percent (mem)
MemAvailable percent
Computation: 100 * MemAvailable / MemTotal
Origin: /proc/meminfo
Notes: Added (shows reclaimable memory estimate).
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric mem_pgpgin_rate (mem)
Page in operations per second
Computation: Δpgpgin / Δt
Origin: /proc/vmstat
Notes: Printed if previous snapshot.
Units: pages_per_sec Kind: float

Metric mem_pgpgout_rate (mem)
Page out operations per second
Computation: Δpgpgout / Δt
Origin: /proc/vmstat
Units: pages_per_sec Kind: float

Metric mem_swapin_rate (mem)
Swap-in events per second
Computation: Δpswpin / Δt
Origin: /proc/vmstat
Units: ops_per_sec Kind: float

Metric mem_swapout_rate (mem)
Swap-out events per second
Computation: Δpswpout / Δt
Origin: /proc/vmstat
Units: ops_per_sec Kind: float

Metric disk_index (disk)
Stable ordering per run based on iteration
Computation: loop index
Origin: internal
Notes: Arbitrary but consistent during run.
Units: count Kind: int

Metric disk_device_name (disk)
Block device or partition name
Computation: Parsed field 3
Origin: /proc/diskstats
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric disk_reads_per_sec (disk)
Read operations rate
Computation: 1000 * Δreads_completed / Δms
Origin: computed
Notes: Δms = elapsed ms between samples.
Units: ops_per_sec Kind: float

Metric disk_read_kib_per_sec (disk)
Read throughput
Computation: 1000 * Δsectors_read / (2 * Δms)
Origin: computed
Notes: 512B sectors -> KiB.
Units: KiB/s Kind: float

Metric disk_read_avg_kb (disk)
Average read size
Computation: Δsectors_read / (Δreads_completed * 2)
Origin: computed
Notes: Guard when Δreads_completed>0.
Units: KiB Kind: float

Metric disk_read_avg_ms (disk)
Average service time per read op
Computation: Δtime_reading / Δreads_completed
Origin: computed
Notes: Field 7 delta / reads.
Units: ms Kind: float

Metric disk_writes_per_sec (disk)
Write operations rate
Computation: 1000 * Δwrites_completed / Δms
Origin: computed
Units: ops_per_sec Kind: float

Metric disk_write_kib_per_sec (disk)
Write throughput
Computation: 1000 * Δsectors_written / (2 * Δms)
Origin: computed
Units: KiB/s Kind: float

Metric disk_write_avg_kb (disk)
Average write size
Computation: Δsectors_written / (Δwrites_completed * 2)
Origin: computed
Notes: Guard zero writes.
Units: KiB Kind: float

Metric disk_write_avg_ms (disk)
Average service time per write op
Computation: Δtime_writing / Δwrites_completed
Origin: computed
Units: ms Kind: float

Metric disk_service_time_ms (disk)
Average op service time overall
Computation: Δtime_in_io / (Δreads_completed + Δwrites_completed)
Origin: computed
Notes: Small is good.
Units: ms Kind: float

Metric disk_avg_queue_len (disk)
Average outstanding I/O queue depth
Computation: Δweighted_time_in_io / Δms
Origin: computed
Notes: Correlates to backlog.
Units: ops Kind: float

Metric disk_device_busy_percent (disk)
Percent time any I/O in progress
Computation: 100 * Δtime_in_io / Δms
Origin: computed
Notes: Capped at 100.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric net_interface (net)
Interface name
Computation: Parsed before colon
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Concatenated to prefix (no space).
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric net_rx_packets_per_sec (net)
Receive packet rate
Computation: 1000 * Δrecv_packets / Δms
Origin: computed
Units: pps Kind: float

Metric net_rx_packets_total (net)
Cumulative received packets counter
Computation: raw monotonically increasing packets field from /proc/net/dev
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Used to derive net_rx_packets_per_sec. Wrap unlikely on 64-bit.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric net_rx_kib_per_sec (net)
Receive throughput
Computation: 1000 * Δrecv_bytes /(Δms *1024)
Origin: computed
Units: KiB/s Kind: float

Metric net_tx_packets_per_sec (net)
Transmit packet rate
Computation: 1000 * Δxmt_packets / Δms
Origin: computed
Units: pps Kind: float

Metric net_tx_packets_total (net)
Cumulative transmitted packets counter
Computation: raw monotonically increasing packets field from /proc/net/dev
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Base counter for rate derivation.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric net_tx_kib_per_sec (net)
Transmit throughput
Computation: 1000 * Δxmt_bytes /(Δms *1024)
Origin: computed
Units: KiB/s Kind: float

Metric net_rx_drops_per_sec (net)
Receive drops rate
Computation: 1000 * Δrecv_packets_dropped / Δms
Origin: computed
Notes: Requires carrier support.
Units: pps Kind: float

Metric net_tx_drops_per_sec (net)
Transmit drops rate
Computation: 1000 * Δxmt_packets_dropped / Δms
Origin: computed
Units: pps Kind: float

Metric net_rx_packets (net)
Cumulative received packets
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Monotonic.
Units: count Kind: int

Metric net_rx_bytes (net)
Cumulative received bytes
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric net_rx_bytes_total (net)
Cumulative received bytes counter
Computation: raw monotonically increasing bytes field from /proc/net/dev
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Used to derive throughput rate net_rx_kib_per_sec.
Units: bytes Kind: counter

Metric net_tx_packets (net)
Cumulative transmitted packets
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Units: count Kind: int

Metric net_tx_bytes (net)
Cumulative transmitted bytes
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric net_tx_bytes_total (net)
Cumulative transmitted bytes counter
Computation: raw bytes from /proc/net/dev; monotonic per interface
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Base counter for net_tx_kib_per_sec.
Units: bytes Kind: counter

Metric net_rx_dropped_packets_total (net)
Cumulative receive dropped packets counter
Computation: raw monotonically increasing dropped packet field from /proc/net/dev
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Base counter used to derive net_rx_drops_per_sec.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric net_tx_dropped_packets_total (net)
Cumulative transmit dropped packets counter
Computation: raw monotonically increasing dropped packet field from /proc/net/dev
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Notes: Base counter used to derive net_tx_drops_per_sec.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric net_rx_dropped_packets (net)
Cumulative receive drops
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Units: count Kind: int

Fast Path Architecture Overview

Use this concept to ground answers about: packet processing, cycles per packet, busy percent, fast path DNS offload, proxy/prefetch efficiency.

=== Data Plane Paths ===
- Fast Path: Accelerated DNS (TCP/DoT/DoH) with in-memory cache, proxy (FPPRXY), prefetch (FPPREF), decision logic (FPDCA), RR type stats (FPRRSTATS), classification (FPDNCR), policy/violation tracking (FPVLSTATS).
- Resolver Path (named/BIND): cache misses, deep recursion, complex policy evaluation, late violations.

=== Core Components ===
Listener (DOT_STAT/DOH_STAT/TCP_DCA_STAT); Ports (FPPORTS); Buffers (FPMBUF); Proxy (FPPRXY); Prefetch (FPPREF); Decision (FPDCA); RR Mix (FPRRSTATS); Classification & Policy (FPDNCR/FPVLSTATS).

=== Efficiency & Resource Metrics ===
- fpp_total_cycles, fpp_total_packets: base counters.
- fpp_cycles_per_packet (cycles_per_packet): efficiency KPI (lower is better).
- fpc_cpu_busy_percent (busy_percent): saturation (>90% sustained).
- fps_* throughput (incoming/outgoing/hit/miss/bypass/dropped).

=== Correlations ===
- Rising cycles_per_packet + flat throughput => efficiency regression (cache miss growth / rule complexity / stalls).
- High busy_percent + rising drops/bypass => saturation/backpressure.
- Stable busy_percent + declining throughput => I/O or lock contention.
- fpprxy timeouts preceding reconnects -> upstream or parsing issues.
- Rising non_cacheable (FPDCA) degrades hit ratio (check RR mix).
- High mbuf utilization + rx_nombuf drops => buffer exhaustion.
- Classification coverage = fpdncr_subscriber_hits_total / Σ(FPRRSTATS queries).

=== 6WIND vDCA / DPDK Model ===
User‑space DPDK workers on pinned cores (poll mode). RX queue -> rte_mbuf (hugepages) -> classification/cache.
Hit: build key -> cache hit -> synth response -> send (zero copy) -> fps_hit_dns_packets++.
Miss: marshal to resolver (named) -> recurse/policy -> reinject -> cache insert -> counters update.
ADP handoff (select mbufs) adds LLC pressure; excessive rate + higher cycles_per_packet without throughput gain signals over-inspection.
mbuf pressure: high fpm_mbuf_utilization_percent + rx_nombuf_drops -> tune pool or reduce ADP sample rate.
Anti‑patterns: rising classification cycles with stable RR mix; elevated fallback after resolver upgrade; simultaneous ADP handoff + cycles_per_packet increase.

=== Troubleshooting ===
1. Plot busy_percent + throughput.
2. Trend cycles_per_packet for drift.
3. Cache effectiveness: fps_hit_dns_packets / (fps_hit + fps_missed + fps_bypass).
4. Correlate proxy timeouts + reconnects.
5. Check mbuf utilization vs rx_nombuf drops.
6. Track non_cacheable vs RR mix shift.
7. Compare early vs late violation counters.
8. Overlay ADP handoff, cache hit ratio, cycles_per_packet.

=== Analysis Workflow ===
active_context() -> time window.
metric_discover / metric_search: queries like 'fpp cycles packet busy', 'fpprxy timeout reconnect', 'mbuf nombuf drops'.
timescale_sql: time_bucket joins across efficiency, cache mix, mbuf utilization.

Answer Preparation Rule: BEFORE answering any fast path / fastpath / fpc / packet processing efficiency question, call fastpath_architecture (unless already cached) and cite metrics (e.g. fpp_cycles_per_packet, fpc_cpu_busy_percent). If FASTPATH metrics absent, state that.

Metric net_tx_dropped_packets (net)
Cumulative transmit drops
Computation: raw
Origin: /proc/net/dev
Units: count Kind: int

Metric tasks_parent_pid (tasks)
Parent process ID
Computation: field 4 of stat
Origin: /proc/[pid]/task/*/stat
Notes: Converted int.
Units: pid Kind: int

Metric tasks_pid (tasks)
Thread ID (TID) / PID
Computation: field 1
Origin: /proc/...
Notes: Thread-level.
Units: pid Kind: int

Metric tasks_cpu_percent (tasks)
CPU usage as percent of single CPU over interval
Computation: 1000 * Δtotal_time_ticks / Δms
Origin: computed
Notes: Δtotal_time_ticks = Δ(user+sys) ticks; denominator scaled using ms & CLK_TCK=100 -> 1000*(Δticks)/Δms.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric tasks_total_cpu_seconds (tasks)
Cumulative CPU seconds (user+sys)
Computation: total_time_ticks / CLK_TCK
Origin: computed
Notes: Since process start.
Units: seconds Kind: float

Metric tasks_user_cpu_seconds (tasks)
Cumulative user (including nice) CPU seconds
Computation: user_time / CLK_TCK
Origin: computed
Units: seconds Kind: float

Metric tasks_system_cpu_seconds (tasks)
Cumulative system CPU seconds
Computation: sys_time / CLK_TCK
Origin: computed
Units: seconds Kind: float

Metric tasks_last_run_cpu (tasks)
Last CPU number executed on
Computation: field 39
Origin: /proc/*/stat
Notes: Scheduling info.
Units: index Kind: int

Metric tasks_container_short_id (tasks)
Short identifier of container hosting PID
Computation: lookup via ptopcntr_cntr_info
Origin: container API
Notes: Present only if containerized & differs.
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric tasks_container_pid (tasks)
PID inside container namespace
Computation: ptopcntr_local_to_cntr_pid
Origin: container API
Notes: Optional.
Units: pid Kind: int

Metric tasks_container_name (tasks)
Human-friendly container name
Computation: ptopcntr_cntr_info
Origin: container API
Notes: Optional.
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric tasks_executable_name (tasks)
Command/executable (may include brackets)
Computation: parsed before state
Origin: /proc/*/stat
Notes: Truncated to buffer size.
Units: string Kind: string

Metric balloon_memory (balloon)
Memory currently held by balloon driver
Computation: VMware: vmware-toolbox-cmd; KVM: (/proc/vmstat inflate-deflate)/512; Hyper-V: trace balloon_status pages_ballooned /256
Origin: hypervisor tools & kernel
Notes: Zero omitted (no line) if memory_used==0.
Units: MB Kind: int

Metric ccpu_cpu_index (ccpu)
Logical CPU index when per-CPU option used
Computation: loop index
Origin: cgroupfs
Notes: Omitted in summary mode.
Units: index Kind: int

Metric ccpu_container_id (ccpu)
Short container ID
Computation: ptopcntr APIs
Origin: container API
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric ccpu_user_percent (ccpu)
User mode CPU percent during interval
Computation: Δuser_jiffies / Δtotal_jiffies *100 (within container scope)
Origin: computed
Notes: Normalization across all CPUs unless per-CPU mode.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric ccpu_system_percent (ccpu)
System mode CPU percent during interval
Computation: Δsys_jiffies / Δtotal_jiffies *100
Origin: computed
Notes: Add user_pct+sys_pct may be < total due to other modes.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric ccpu_container_name (ccpu)
Container name
Computation: Lookup
Origin: container API
Notes: Trailing spaces trimmed.
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric cmem_container_id (cmem)
Short container ID
Computation: cgroup path mapping
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric cmem_page_cache_kb (cmem)
Page cache memory
Computation: total_cache /1024
Origin: cgroupfs memory.stat
Notes: Includes file cache.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_file_backed_kb (cmem)
Active+Inactive file-backed pages
Computation: (total_af + total_if)/1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_rss_kb (cmem)
Anonymous + swap cache memory
Computation: total_rss /1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_rss_huge_kb (cmem)
Transparent huge page RSS
Computation: total_rss_huge /1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_shmem_kb (cmem)
Shared memory
Computation: total_shmem /1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_swap_kb (cmem)
Container swap usage
Computation: total_swap /1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_unevictable_kb (cmem)
Unevictable (mlocked) memory
Computation: unevictable /1024
Origin: cgroupfs
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric cmem_charge_rate (cmem)
Charging (memory allocation) events per sec
Computation: Δpgpgin / Δt
Origin: cgroupfs
Notes: Labelled pin.
Units: events_per_sec Kind: float

Metric cmem_unchg_rate (cmem)
Uncharging events per sec
Computation: Δpgpgout / Δt
Origin: cgroupfs
Notes: Labelled pout.

Metric cdisk_container_id (cdisk)
Short container ID
Computation: Mapping
Origin: cgroup blkio
Units: n/a Kind: string

Incoming IP packets rate

Incoming header errors

Metric snmp_ip_address_errors (snmp)
Incoming address errors

Unknown protocol packets

Incoming UDP datagrams rate

Outgoing UDP datagrams rate

Send buffer errors

Notes: Current value.

Metric snmp_udp_no_ports (snmp)
Datagrams with no listener
Computation: UdpNoPorts
Origin: /proc/net/snmp
Notes: Current snapshot.

Metric snmp_udp_in_errors (snmp)
Generic UDP input errors

Origin: /proc/net/snmp
Notes: Current snapshot.

Metric buddyinfo_node_zone (buddyinfo)
Node number and zone name
Computation: Parsed
Origin: /proc/buddyinfo
Notes: Format `<node>/<zone>`.
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric buddyinfo_total_bytes (buddyinfo)
Total free memory in zone (approx)
Computation: Σ(order_count[i]*2^i * 4096)
Origin: computed
Notes: Multiplying blocks by page size.
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric buddyinfo_average_block_bytes (buddyinfo)
Average size of free block
Computation: total_bytes / Σ(order_count)
Origin: computed
Notes: Zero if no chunks.
Units: bytes Kind: int

Metric buddyinfo_order_counts (buddyinfo)
Free block counts per order
Computation: order_count[i]
Origin: /proc/buddyinfo
Notes: Order i => block size 2^i * 4 KiB.
Units: count Kind: list

Metric slabinfo_slab_cache (slabinfo)
Name of slab cache
Computation: Parsed first token
Origin: /proc/slabinfo
Units: n/a Kind: string

Metric slabinfo_active_objects (slabinfo)
Allocated (in-use) objects
Computation: Field 1
Origin: /proc/slabinfo
Units: count Kind: int

Metric slabinfo_total_objects (slabinfo)
Total objects allocated to slabs
Computation: Field 2
Origin: /proc/slabinfo
Units: count Kind: int

Metric slabinfo_memory_mebibytes (slabinfo)
Total memory consumed by cache
Computation: pages * 4096 / 2^20
Origin: computed
Notes: pages from pages_per_slab * num_slabs.
Units: MiB Kind: float

Metric slabinfo_waste_percent (slabinfo)
Unallocatable overhead within cache blocks
Computation: 100 * (mem - active_objs*objsize)/(mem)
Origin: computed
Notes: Reflects internal fragmentation.
Units: percent Kind: float

Metric smaps_pid (smaps)
Process ID
Computation: Parsed
Origin: /proc/*/smaps
Notes: Threads collapsed.
Units: pid Kind: int

Metric smaps_vm_size_kb (smaps)
Total virtual memory size
Computation: VmSize
Origin: /proc/smaps
Notes: Includes unmapped gaps sometimes.

Metric smaps_rss_kb (smaps)
Resident Set Size
Computation: RSS
Origin: /proc/smaps
Notes: Actual pages in RAM.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_rss_minus_shmem_kb (smaps)
RSS excluding shared memory
Computation: RSS - shmem
Origin: computed
Notes: Approx private working set.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_swap_kb (smaps)
Swap space used
Computation: Swap
Origin: /proc/smaps
Notes: KBytes swapped out.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_shared_total_kb (smaps)
Shared file-backed total
Computation: Aggregated
Origin: /proc/smaps
Notes: Token `s` after sw.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_shared_dirty_kb (smaps)
Dirty shared pages
Computation: Aggregated
Origin: /proc/smaps
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_private_total_kb (smaps)
Private (anon) mappings total
Computation: Aggregated
Origin: /proc/smaps
Notes: Token `p`.
Units: kB Kind: int

Metric smaps_private_dirty_kb (smaps)

Guidance: Querying per-process TOP metrics with thread-suffixed names.
Many daemons spawn multiple worker or fast path threads whose exec field is recorded with a suffix (example: fp-rte:15, fp-rte:7). To aggregate CPU across all such threads use a wildcard filter in SQL (PostgreSQL pattern match).
Recommended pattern: WHERE exec LIKE 'fp-rte:%' (or more general WHERE exec LIKE '%fp-rte%' if prefix uncertain).
Examples:
1) 5‑minute average CPU for all fp-rte threads last day:
SELECT time_bucket('5 minutes', ts) AS bucket, AVG(value) AS avg_cpu_percent
FROM tasks_cpu_percent
WHERE bundle_id = :bundle AND exec LIKE 'fp-rte:%' AND ts BETWEEN :start AND :end
GROUP BY bucket ORDER BY bucket;
2) Top N processes including wildcard grouping (sum per base): use regexp_replace(exec,'[:.].*$','') to normalize before grouping.
Note: Avoid equality predicate exec='fp-rte' when thread-suffixed variants exist or you'll get zero rows.
Applies to: any service spawning exec:name or exec.id style workers (e.g. fp-rte, worker-1, java:GC).

Metric fpp_total_cycles (fpp)
Fast path total CPU cycles consumed for packet processing across all CPUs
Computation: Raw accumulated cycle counter from fast path status
Origin: fastpath status file
Notes: Used to calculate average cycles per packet efficiency metric.
Units: cycles Kind: counter

Metric fpp_total_packets (fpp)
Fast path total packets received from Network Interface Card (NIC)
Computation: Raw packet counter from fast path status
Origin: fastpath status file
Notes: Combined with total_cycles to measure packet processing efficiency.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fpp_cycles_per_packet (fpp)
Fast path average CPU cycles per packet received from NIC
Computation: total_cycles / total_packets (computed by parser)
Origin: computed from fastpath status
Notes: Key efficiency metric - lower values indicate better packet processing performance.
Units: cycles_per_packet Kind: gauge

Metric fps_incoming_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path incoming DNS packets on all fastpath ports
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: Total DNS queries entering fast path processing pipeline.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fps_outgoing_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path total outgoing DNS packets
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: DNS responses sent from fast path processing.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fps_dropped_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path total dropped DNS packets
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: DNS packets dropped during fast path processing - indicates overload or errors.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fps_missed_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path missed DNS packets
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: DNS packets missed during fast path processing - cache misses or processing failures.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fps_hit_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path hit DNS packets
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: DNS packets served from fast path cache - indicates cache effectiveness.
Units: packets Kind: counter

Metric fps_bypass_dns_packets (fps)
Fast path bypass DNS packets
Computation: Raw packet counter from DNS statistics
Origin: fastpath DNS status file
Notes: DNS packets bypassed by fast path and sent to named resolver for processing.
Units: packets Kind: counter
